Ritualist:DarkRitual.NAME: Dark Ritual
Ritualist:DarkRitual.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Gain [G] [G] [G]. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1 this combat.
Ritualist:DarkRitual.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ritual +2. NL Gain !M! Energy. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1 this combat.

Ritualist:SummonAgiel.NAME: Summon Agiel
Ritualist:SummonAgiel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Vessel: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:ScaryShank.NAME: Scary Shank
Ritualist:ScaryShank.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.

Ritualist:RitualBloodletter.NAME: Ritual Bloodletter
Ritualist:RitualBloodletter.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this is your last card, gain [G] [G] and draw 2 cards.
Ritualist:RitualBloodletter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is your last card in hand, NL Gain [G] [G] [G] and draw 2 cards.

Ritualist:EmptyPalms.NAME: Empty Palms
Ritualist:EmptyPalms.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn, when you have no cards in hand, gain !B! Block.

Ritualist:QuickStudy.NAME: Quick Study
Ritualist:QuickStudy.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Draw 1 card. NL If you draw a Ritual, gain !B! Block.

Ritualist:ImpFeast.NAME: Imp Feast
Ritualist:ImpFeast.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Possession to all enemies. They lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:CostlyPreparation.NAME: Costly Preparation
Ritualist:CostlyPreparation.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Lose up to 4 Attune. Draw that many cards +1 next turn.
Ritualist:CostlyPreparation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ritual +2. NL Lose up to 4 Attune. Draw that many cards +1 next turn.

Ritualist:TemporalRites.NAME: Temporal Rites
Ritualist:TemporalRites.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Draw all Rituals from your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:ScoutAhead.NAME: Scout Ahead
Ritualist:ScoutAhead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

Ritualist:BranchingPaths.NAME: Branching Paths
Ritualist:BranchingPaths.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

Ritualist:SoulOpening.NAME: Soul Opening
Ritualist:SoulOpening.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL If target is Possessed apply 3 Possession.

Ritualist:TwistedEcstasy.NAME: Twisted Ecstasy
Ritualist:TwistedEcstasy.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, your Rituals cost 0. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:MassDrainLife.NAME: Mass Drain Life
Ritualist:MassDrainLife.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to and remove the Possession from each enemy. Heal HP equal to 1 / !M! of it. Exhaust.

Ritualist:PullFromBeyond.NAME: Pull From Beyond
Ritualist:PullFromBeyond.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile into your deck. Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:PullFromBeyond.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Put a card from your exhaust and discard pile into your deck. Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:ThoughtfulArt.NAME: Thoughtful Art
Ritualist:ThoughtfulArt.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If you've played more than !M! cards this turn, gain !B! block and draw 1 card.

Ritualist:PowerPact.NAME: Power Pact
Ritualist:PowerPact.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage and gain !M! Strength. In three turns lose !M+2! Strength. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:DeadlyVelocity.NAME: Deadly Velocity
Ritualist:DeadlyVelocity.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card gain !M! Strength and Dexterity until end of turn.
Ritualist:DeadlyVelocity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you play a card gain !M! Strength and Dexterity until end of turn.

Ritualist:DemonArm.NAME: Demon Arm
Ritualist:DemonArm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack deal !M! damage to 1 random enemy.

Ritualist:WinningGambit.NAME: Winning Gambit
Ritualist:WinningGambit.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Play the top card of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Ritualist:WinningGambit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Play the top card of your draw pile.

Ritualist:LongCon.NAME: Long Con
Ritualist:LongCon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. In two turns, gain [G] [G].

Ritualist:Retreat.NAME: Retreat
Ritualist:Retreat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put !M! card from your draw pile on top of it and upgrade them.

Ritualist:DrainStrength.NAME: Drain Strength
Ritualist:DrainStrength.DESCRIPTION: Remove all possession from an enemy. Gain that much Strength. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:CleanseByBlood.NAME: Cleanse By Blood
Ritualist:CleanseByBlood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Banish a summoned demon.

Ritualist:GrowingRites.NAME: Growing Rites
Ritualist:GrowingRites.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn gain !M! Attunement.

Ritualist:DuskSeeker.NAME: Dusk Seeker
Ritualist:DuskSeeker.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn add 1 card from your deck to your hand.

Ritualist:Arrival.NAME: Arrival
Ritualist:Arrival.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Put 1 Summon card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:Arrival.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Put 1 Summon card from your discard and draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:TwinWave.NAME: Twin Wave
Ritualist:TwinWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. At the start of your next turn, repeat.

Ritualist:StrategicCut.NAME: Strategic Cut
Ritualist:StrategicCut.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn draw !M! additional cards.

Ritualist:SpreadingCurse.NAME: Spreading Curse
Ritualist:SpreadingCurse.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! Possession to ALL enemies.

Ritualist:SummonBaphomet.NAME: Summon Baphomet
Ritualist:SummonBaphomet.DESCRIPTION: Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Vessel: Lose [G]. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:SummonBaphomet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Vessel: Lose [G]. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:TransientGhost.NAME: Transient Ghost
Ritualist:TransientGhost.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Possession. In 3 turns that enemy loses !M! Possession.

Ritualist:Impale.NAME: Impale
Ritualist:Impale.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you are a Vessel deal !M! more.

Ritualist:DeadlyBlows.NAME: Deadly Blows
Ritualist:DeadlyBlows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Exhaust a random card.
Ritualist:DeadlyBlows.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Exhaust a card.

Ritualist:EvilIntentions.NAME: Evil Intentions
Ritualist:EvilIntentions.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2 cards. NL Gain [G] [G] [G] [G]. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:BloodBoil.NAME: Blood Boil
Ritualist:BloodBoil.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. Retain. NL Gain [G]. If you retain this card lose !M! life and gain 1 Strength.

Ritualist:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
Ritualist:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Each time you play 3 cards in a turn gain [G].
Ritualist:Momentum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Each time you play 3 cards in a turn gain [G].

Ritualist:CostlyStrength.NAME: Costly Strength
Ritualist:CostlyStrength.DESCRIPTION: Lose up to 5 Attunement. Gain twice that much strength next turn only. NL Exhaust.
Ritualist:CostlyStrength.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose up to 5 Attunement. Gain twice that much strength next turn only.

Ritualist:ShallowCut.NAME: Shallow Cut
Ritualist:ShallowCut.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Draw !M! card.

Ritualist:SummonRerek.NAME: Summon Rerek
Ritualist:SummonRerek.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Vessel: Take 3 damage and gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

Ritualist:QuietMeditation.NAME: Quiet Meditation
Ritualist:QuietMeditation.DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! random Ritual card to your hand.
Ritualist:QuietMeditation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ritual. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! random Ritual cards to your hand.

Ritualist:RudeInterruption.NAME: Rude Interruption
Ritualist:RudeInterruption.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack apply 4 Possession and they lose !M! Strength this turn.

Ritualist:IndKnifing.NAME: Indiscriminated
Ritualist:IndKnifing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy !M! times.

Ritualist:EarlyReturn.NAME: Early Return
Ritualist:EarlyReturn.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less this turn for each Ritual played with this in hand. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

Ritualist:Sabbath.NAME: Sabbath
Ritualist:Sabbath.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Ritual draw !M! card.
Ritualist:Sabbath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Ritual draw !M! cards.

Ritualist:DeepReserves.NAME: Deep Reserves
Ritualist:DeepReserves.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional cards and gain !M! Attunement.
